import request from'../utils/request';//请求逻辑实例化
var Login={post:function post(){var params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var username=params.username,password=params.password;var data=request.post("/_api2/user/login?id=9&password=".concat(password,"&userType=1&username=").concat(username),params).then(function(response){console.log(response);return response;});return data;}};export default Login;
